```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(icon)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Esempio veloce

### Iris dataset point

```{r echo=TRUE}
ggplot(iris)+
  geom_point(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species))+
  theme_bw()
```

### Iris dataset boxplot

```{r echo=TRUE}
ggplot(iris)+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Width, fill = Species))+
  theme_bw()
```
